question_text: A technician is troubleshooting a laptop that fails to pair with a contactless badge reader. Which two steps would be most relevant?
answer_options: Verify the NFC feature is enabled in BIOS or OS settings
Ensure Wi-Fi is disabled to prevent interference
Check that the reader supports the specific NFC protocol used
Move the device within inches of the reader and test alignment
correct_answer: Verify the NFC feature is enabled in BIOS or OS settings
Move the device within inches of the reader and test alignment
explanation: NFC troubleshooting often involves enabling the feature in software and ensuring very close physical proximity between devices.
